formattedAddress: 42A E 74th St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 42A E 74th St, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: I had my surgery almost 4yrs ago , On Oct 16, 2012. I was very happy with my results, like any surgery I had pain after but in a month I was back to myself. Today I'm feeling better about myself. I had a little scare when I felt a lump in my right breast and I hurried to see him. But all was well. I thank God that I was able to have a good surgeon because I was so scared to do this procedure. I have recommended him to my friends, family and coworkers.

originalText.text:
Dr Abramson and his team including, Kerri Ann and Zoe were all incredible. I was a G bra size and extremely uneven and had many back issues and therefore was looking to get a breast reduction.

Dr. Abramson was very easy to work with - there was no jumping through hoops with him to explain why I wanted to do this. I met with him back in July of 2016 and from then I followed all instructions to insure insurance would cover my surgery, as to be clear this was not cosmetic.

After 6 months of physical therapy and doctor appointments I was 100% approved by insurance meaning they covered my entire surgery. I did not have to pay anything out of pocket. This was with the help and guidance of Kerri Ann.

After being approved by insurance, I met with Dr. Abramson to take a look at me one last time prior to surgery where he explained everything and answered every question my mom and I had. He never rushed me!!

The week before I was supposed to have surgery I had a terrible chest cold which worried me and thought about postponing the surgery. When I called the office I spoke to Zoe and explained the situation. She told me that Dr. Abramson would call me back - which he did within seconds. He explained to me that I was worried and anxious understandably and they don't cancel this surgery for a cold and to just calm down and everything would be okay - let's just say I went through with it that Friday as scheduled.

When we arrived to the hospital and I was settled in he came by explained everything again and made sure that I was calm. He also kept my parents very well informed while I was in surgery.

After being home for a week recovering, unfortunately my right breast started to leak fluid - this happened on Sunday morning. Worried, my mom and I called the emergency hotline to get in touch with Dr Abramson to see what was up. Again, within seconds he called back and let us know not worry that he would meet with us at his NYC office at 8:45  that next morning as he knew I had work but wanted to check me out. He let us know when we called him Sunday he was on a plane for a 24 hour trip to Boston with his family and the plane doors were closing but he made sure to call us back before he was in-flight. He then explained it was just fluid and everything was fine and not to worry but to keep him updated.

As I was still leaking after a week, I scheduled another appointment with Dr. A At his NYC office that upcoming Monday.  He realized a stitch had been irritating the area so he fixed it and sent me on my way which fixed the problem.

I just saw him again today after a month and half of having the surgery and again he was super nice and warm as was Kerri Ann and Zoe. Although there were some moments that were of concern, Dr. A ALWAYS answered my questions and kept me calm. My breasts honestly look amazing and I would do the whole thing over again for the results I have now. I have to thank Dr. Abramson, Kerri Ann, Zoe and staff for being so amazing during this time and process. I would recommend this team to EVERYONE !!!!!

originalText.text: I was recommended to Dr Abramson from a friend. When I met Dr Abramson he was very professional and explained the procedure very well. After surgery I saw him, he was very caring and had a great bedside manner. I’m very happy with my current results.

text.text: I was recommended to Dr Abramson from a friend. When I met Dr Abramson he was very professional and explained the procedure very well. After surgery I saw him, he was very caring and had a great bedside manner. I’m very happy with my current results.

originalText.text: I tried to book an appointment and out of nowhere the receptionist starts arguing with me about the price of the procedure. Also, what insane doctor asks for a 10% deposit on a procedure before they have even made a physical assessment! Stay away from this place! The people are rude and disgusting!

text.text: I tried to book an appointment and out of nowhere the receptionist starts arguing with me about the price of the procedure. Also, what insane doctor asks for a 10% deposit on a procedure before they have even made a physical assessment! Stay away from this place! The people are rude and disgusting!

originalText.text: He is the best and he is so efficient! I have referred several friends to him and they were always pleased with the level of services they’ve received.
